isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX™ BRAKE BOOSTER AND MASTER CYLINDER - DESCRIPTION - HYDRO-MAX™ BOOSTER AND BACKUP PUMP ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: HYDRO-MAX™ BOOSTER AND BACKUP PUMP ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 1 for all items in parentheses.

The Hydro-Max™ booster assembly (Item 1) is primarily powered by the power steering pump. The booster is equipped with a backup pump (Item 2) to provide limited power assisted stops if the primary hydraulic booster system does not function or the engine is off. The Hydro-Max™ booster contains a flow switch (Item 3) that turns on a relay (Item 4), which turns on the backup pump in the event of a loss of flow of power steering fluid from the power steering pump. The flow switch will also illuminate a warning light in the vehicle instrument panel.
